REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Relates to the creation of an ATV trail fund
Summary: Relates to the creation of an ATV trail fund.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd Title D Title Head, add Art 26 §§26.01 & 26.03, Pks & Rec L; rpld §2282 sub 4 cl ¶, amd §§2282, 2404, 2411 & 2281, add §2414, V & T L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, the vehicle and traffic law and the state finance law, in relation to the creation of an ATV trail fund
